name: Sweet Jewel Connect 2
description:
Welcome to the world of the jewels, these colorful jewels. Sweet Jewel Connect 2 is a very addictive match-three game!
How to play:
- Link 3 or more adjacent same diamonds
- The more jewels eliminated, the higher score is achieved
- Match 7 or more jewels to create strong and explosive special jewels
- Accomplish level target within limited moves
- Create power-ups strategically to achieve level targets
